operator.name: Tours Northwest
operator.operatorType: Mid-size family operator, 30+ years in business
operator.vehicles: 14-32 passenger mini-coaches with large oversized windows

products.title: Mt Rainier Tour from Seattle
products.shortDescription: Full-day guided tour from Seattle to Mt. Rainier National Park featuring old-growth forests, wildflower meadows, and waterfalls with professional guides in comfortable mini-coaches.
products.description: Visit Mt. Rainier from Seattle with professional, enthusiastic, and informative guides. Travel in clean, comfortable 24-passenger mini-coaches with large windows, high-back seats, and air-conditioning. Experience old-growth forests, wildflower-filled meadows, and thundering waterfalls. Options for all hiking abilities. Summer and winter tours available with different routes and experiences.

ageRestrictions.notes: Children under 5 are not permitted on this tour

seasonality.notes: Year-round. Summer and winter tours differ in route and accessibility. Winter tours have limited availability.

features.value: Comfortable 24-passenger mini-coach with A/C and large windows
Wildflower meadows, old-growth forests, and waterfalls (summer)
No minimum required number of guests — all scheduled tours run
Options to hike a lot, a little, or not at all — all abilities welcome
Bring camera, comfortable walking shoes, layered clothing. Sunscreen encouraged.

locations.name: MoPop Pickup
locations.notes: Best option for parking downtown Seattle

locations.name: SeaTac Matt Griffin YMCA
locations.notes: Best option for parking in SeaTac. NEW!

faqs.question: What hotels do you pick up at?
faqs.answer: No direct hotel pickups. 3 convenient downtown pickup locations within walking distance of most hotels, plus SeaTac location.

faqs.question: Where can I park?
faqs.answer: MoPOP pickup location recommended. Republic Parking Memorial Stadium Lot at 401 5th Ave N offers $10 all-day rate before 9am.

products.title: Seattle Highlights: Seattle City Tour Bus
products.shortDescription: 3-hour guided bus tour covering nearly 50 miles of Seattle's most iconic landmarks and neighborhoods.
products.description: Ride in comfort in a specialized sightseeing bus through steep downtown hills. Covers nearly 50 miles including Pike Place Market, Pioneer Square underground city, Fremont Troll, Seattle Waterfront, and unique neighborhoods. 4 convenient meeting locations.
products.pricingNotes: From $89.00. Child pricing not visible on listing page.

features.value: No hotel pickup — see Seattle City Tour PLUS Hotel Pickup for that option

products.title: Seattle City Tour Package PLUS Hotel Pickup
products.shortDescription: 3-hour Seattle city tour with luxury hotel pickup and drop-off from most downtown Seattle hotels.
products.description: Enjoy hotel pickup and drop-off combined with an informative small-group tour covering almost 50 miles including three main stops: Pioneer Square, Ballard Locks, and a city skyline viewpoint. Knowledgeable licensed guides with 11 years of TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence.
products.pricingNotes: From $114.00. Child pricing not visible on listing page.

features.value: Hotel pickup and drop-off from most downtown Seattle hotels
Three main stops: Pioneer Square, Ballard Locks, city skyline viewpoint

locations.name: Hotel pickup
locations.notes: Most downtown Seattle hotels. Handful of hotels cannot be picked up from due to loading zones.

products.title: Pre-Alaska Cruise Transportation and City Tour
products.shortDescription: 3-hour Seattle city tour combined with cruise port shuttle service, including luggage handling and guaranteed on-time cruise terminal delivery.
products.description: Combines Alaska Cruise transportation with Seattle city tour. Hotel pickup, luggage handling, sightseeing tour, and guaranteed cruise port drop-off. Works as a Seattle cruise transfer with sightseeing included.
products.pricingNotes: From $114. Child pricing not visible on listing page.

features.value: Post-cruise tour available as private group option

locations.name: Hotel pickup
locations.notes: Downtown Seattle hotels. Some hotels may require meeting at nearby hotel.

products.title: Ultimate Seattle Experience: City Tour, Pike Place Market & Argosy Harbor Cruise Combo
products.shortDescription: 7-hour combo experience combining city tour, Pike Place Market, 1-hour Argosy Harbor Cruise, and optional Space Needle visit.
products.description: Experience Seattle by land and sea. Combines city tour with 1-hour Harbor Cruise with Argosy Cruises, lunch on the Seattle Waterfront, 1 hour at Pike Place Market, and option to end with Space Needle visit.
products.pricingNotes: From $159. Child pricing ($139) and infant (0-3 free) mentioned in recon but not visible on tours listing page.

features.value: Lunch on Seattle Waterfront (time, not meal provided)
Land and sea experience with option for sky (Space Needle)

products.title: Private Mt. Rainier Tour
products.shortDescription: Private Mt. Rainier National Park tour in a luxury Chevrolet Suburban LTZ with personal expert guide, hotel pickup included.
products.pricingNotes: From $1,399 per group (not per person). SUV for groups of 1-5.

features.value: Hotel pickup in Pearl Chevrolet Suburban LTZ

products.title: Private Snoqualmie Falls Tour
products.shortDescription: Private guided tour to Snoqualmie Falls in a luxury Chevrolet Suburban LTZ with hotel pickup.
products.pricingNotes: From $400 per group. SUV for groups of 1-5.

features.value: Hotel pickup in Pearl Chevrolet Suburban LTZ

products.title: Private SUV Tour – Seattle in One Day
products.shortDescription: 6-hour private Seattle tour covering 50 miles and 7 neighborhoods in a luxury Chevrolet Suburban LTZ with hotel pickup and optional airport drop-off.
products.pricingNotes: From $1,049 per group. SUV for groups of 1-5.

features.value: Hotel pickup in Pearl Chevrolet Suburban LTZ
Pike Place Market stop with lunch time
Space Needle stop — tickets available for purchase
Airport drop-off available. Cruise terminal pickup available with special arrangements.

extractionMetadata.method: Manual — Claude extraction from web_fetch + web_search content
extractionMetadata.notes: Extracted 8 of ~15 products. Missing: Seattle Photo Safari, Snoqualmie Falls public tour, Private SUV Seattle Tour, Private Boeing Factory Tour, Private Museum of Glass Tour, Private Small Group Seattle Tour (Transit), Olympic National Park 2-day Tour, Group/Charter/Team Building (quote-based). Most missing products had no pricing or detail visible in fetched content.
